mapper.select: select id, eval_id, evaluation_type, pile_length_more, pile_length_less, electric_more, electric_less, cement_more,cement_less, lean_more,lean_less, score from t_luding_overall_evaluation where eval_id=#{evalId}
mapper.update: update t_luding_overall_evaluation set eval_id = #{record.evalId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, evaluation_type = #{record.evaluationType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pile_length_more = #{record.pileLengthMore,jdbcType=REAL}, pile_length_less = #{record.pileLengthLess,jdbcType=REAL}, electric_more = #{record.electricMore,jdbcType=REAL}, electric_less = #{record.electricLess,jdbcType=REAL}, cement_more = #{record.cementMore,jdbcType=REAL}, cement_less = #{record.cementLess,jdbcType=REAL}, lean_more = #{record.leanMore,jdbcType=REAL}, lean_less = #{record.leanLess,jdbcType=REAL}, score = #{record.score,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
